values: God’s Mission Triumphs Through Prayerful SufferingGod’s Mission Triumphs Through Prayerful Suffering

As Jesus bleeds in Gethsemane and then submits to arrest, we see that the mission of God triumphs through prayerful suffering, not the self-defending sword.As Jesus bleeds in Gethsemane and then submits to arrest, we see that the mission of God triumphs through prayerful suffering, not the self-defending sword.
